issues: Significant coordinate discrepancy: 20.6 km between asserted coordinates (47.128415, -99.239356) and geocoded location from Chase Lake National Wildlife Refuge

geo_loc_name format partially compliant with NMDC schema but could be more specific
Current vegetation description contains species codes that may need verification
